short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly add any website to your marklet account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use the marklet extension, you'll first need a marklet account.  You can sign up for free in about 20 seconds at http://marklet.com.

Once you install the marklet extension, you can add new marklets instantly as you browse the web.  Just click the "m" button to the right of your address bar, select a category, and the page (or video) you're viewing is instantly saved to marklet and available on all of your devices.
